title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Based on the classic book by Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking bursts on to the screen in this action film. Pippi is a pig-tailed, freckle-faced ball of fun and energy. Mischievous, lovable and always in trouble, Pippi is a young orphan who refuses to let anything stand in her way. Full of colourful characters, fun and laughs "The new adventures of Pippi Longstocking" is a delightful adventure movie for the young and the young at heart.
related_objects: Title; 301934; The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking; Active; 1988
